plot: Break a Dead Lock is a story about three orphans from different countries that were raised and trained by a Master Thief from Hong Kong. Each of them has a distinctive specialty: Fast hands...
title: Break a Dead Lock
plot_es: Break a Dead Lock is a story about three orphans from different countries that were raised and trained by a Master Thief from Hong Kong. Each of them has a distinctive specialty: Fast hands...
